cause.description:
Adam has been trying to drive around, abiding by traffic laws, paying tax and extortionate insurance, watching chav and boy/girl racer scum acting like c*nts. When out of the blue, arsehole avec white van decides to plow into his shinny new pimp mobile.... the pimp mobile lost.
1. Right of way to Adam Webster when driving
2. When Adam is present, no cocks to be cocks in the vercinity

cause.mission: prevent Adam's car being run into by dickheads in big white vans
cause.name: Adam's Car charity
